body_html:
Ah, apparently this does not work, meaning I need to set the op seed, not the graph one.... should I just drop this test? Currently, the test is impossible to do due to:

m = random_ops.random_normal(x_shape, dtype=x.dtype)

in kernel.

body:
Ah, apparently this does not work, meaning I need to set the op seed, not the graph one.... should I just drop this test? Currently, the test is impossible to do due to:
```
m = random_ops.random_normal(x_shape, dtype=x.dtype)
```
in `kernel`.
